@Tornadobullet: Nevermind Windows thinks they are VLC files. Any CD-burning software will recognize the "bin" and "cue" files as disk images. You can also mount them with Daemon Tools or Alcohol. The two files together actually make a single disk image. When burning or mounting, the programs will only "see" one of them (the .cue, I think). The other file (the .bin) has too be in the same directory and have the same name.

So burn it, or mount it, and from there I don't know, I'm still downloading it, install the game I suppose. (Read the nfo with any text editor or nfo viewer, you have instructions there).

how do you use the skidrow thing.  I press space and doesnt work

Installing game steps:
1. Use Daemontools to mount (you can download a trial version of Daemontools).
2. With Daemontools open, drag+drop OR open the .BIN file in Daemontools (mounting the file)
3. Click the icon for Mount and Blade that should show up in Daemontools. This will start the installer.
4. This will install Mount and Blade: Warband version 1.011

Installing crack for the game steps:
1. Go to the Mount and Blade: Warband directory (Usually C:Program Files\Mount&Blade Warband)
2. Locate the folder titled "SKIDROW"
3. In this folder is the crack and the icon/.exe you will use to run this game under the crack
4.Move both files in the folder to the main Mount and Blade directory (C:Program Files\Mount&Blade Warband). It will prompt you to replace a file, replace the file.
5. Run the .exe file called SKIDROW. This will bring up a strange looking screen. I just let it run for a few seconds, then hit SPACEBAR as it tells you to. This will shut the screen automatically. I am not sure if this runs the crack or is just author info, couldn't hurt to do it anyways.
6. Then open the game with mb_warband. Use this icon to open the game from now on.


Follow these steps and it will work. That's how I got mine working.

I tried to run the 'Skidrow.exe' that came in the crack folder in Sandboxie and Avast! popped up and warned me that it was a rootkit.

The file itself has no effect on the game so I would recommend deleting it before you install the game.

Alright since some people are noobs Ill make a Step by Step guide.

Step 1: Burn or mount the image

Step2: Install..... Obviously

Step3: When your done installing you'll be moved to the serial screen just exit it out.

Step4: Go to "my computer" and look for Mount n Blade.

Step5: Right Click it and then click explore.

Step5: Goto the Skidrow folder and copy mb_warband and over-right the one at 

C:\Program Files\Mount&Blade Warband 

or wherever you installed the game

There If done correctly you should be able to play fine.

It's this simple guys..

1. Download Daemon Tools Lite.
2. Mount the .iso file, then install it like any normal game.
3. Go to MY COMPUTER, and browse the folder for the CD that you mounted, and open the SKIDROW folder and copy the two files inside into your Mount and Blade game folders main directory.
The "skidrow" folder is a MSIinfo dokument? And there is no other "skidrow" folders?

If you're looking for the SKIDROW folder, here's how to find it:
1) Mount the image file. It should be called 
sr-mbwbd.cue
2) Go to My Computer and find the mounted image. Right click and select explore.
3) Copy the SKIDROW folder found inside to the installation folder for Mount&Blade: Warband

Hope that helps anyone having trouble finding it

@seanegger The CD key being asked has nothing to do with the Hamachi server. You haven't cracked the game yet. Mount the ISO and go to My Computer, then open the mounted file (might have to right click and select Open or Explore.

From there there is a folder called Skidrow, open it and copy the files into your M&B:W install directory. Then you can play the game, SP or MP

Ok, people who can't find the crack.  I had that problem to.  If you don't know how to find the crack, you can just explore the mounted image.  Or, you can get an uncompressing program such as WinRAR or 7-Zip.  Then, extract the programs you downloaded INSTEAD of using demnoid tools.  You will then get ALL FOLDERS.  This should make it easy to find SKIDROW and copy and paste the crack.
